name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow of numerous fan messages and illustrations for Sakura Miko's 1st Live, 'flower fantasista!'.
Informational slide announcing that the concert will start soon.
Attention slide listing concert rules and precautions for attendees.
A series of slides showcasing exclusive merchandise available for the live event.
Resumption of the fan message and illustration slideshow.

subtitles.original:
開演までしばらくお待ちください
The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english:
Please wait a moment until the start of the performance.
The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場のお客様へ

声出し応援 OK です
subtitles.english:
Attention
To the visiting audience
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance
Cheering loudly is OK
